name: Escape the Bunker
description: Explore half a dozen connected rooms and use your reasoning abilities to Escape the Bunker.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: I5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 800 MB available space
